page.shortlink: api a5 has base filter function
page.description: Returns .t. if the current Form/Browse has a base Filter define.

argument.name: Answer
argument.description: .T. = Layout has a base filter expression .F. = Layout includes all records.

page.discussion: The A5_HAS_BASE_FILTER() function determines if a layout has a base filter expression that selects records from the underlying table or set.

section.description: This function examines the current table, so must be used in the context of a layout.
